analysis.description:
SiliconValleyToken.withdrawAmount (/unique_contracts/0x2af8b34f04e93c79ee3a1f300a019f29869d896a.sol#711-731) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- wallet.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_contracts/0x2af8b34f04e93c79ee3a1f300a019f29869d896a.sol#728)
